headline: Fake promises and awful management
pros: Pizza partys were pretty cool I guess
cons: Everything - management - salary - hours- playing favorites - lies- fake promises - shady HR work - “ you can’t sit with us” type of people

headline: Stay away.
pros: There are no pros because I am still here.
cons: High stress, low pay, poor management, no other employees. Office closed. You don't know who is telling you the truth or who is lying.
